definition: to break (sb's heart)/to cause grief to

sentences.english: His ingratitude cut me to the heart.
sentences.chinese: 他的忘恩负义伤透了我的心。

sentences.english: She was the falsest woman that ever broke man's heartstrings .
sentences.chinese: 她是所有曾经使男人伤透心的女人中最虚情假意的。

sentences.english: Your betrayal has broken Uther's heart, boy.
sentences.chinese: 你的倒戈伤透了乌瑟尔的心，小孩。

sentences.english: In to fill his stomach problem, is that Buha by a headache.
sentences.chinese: 在填饱肚子的问题上，更是令布哈依伤透了脑筋。

sentences.english: Her son's disgrace broke her heart.
sentences.chinese: 孩子做的坏事使她妈的心伤透了。

sentences.english: All love is lucky, even when it breaks your heart.
sentences.chinese: 所有的爱都是幸运的，纵然它伤透了你的心。

sentences.english: Prepareing for the Chirstmas Eve feast makes me at my wit's end.
sentences.chinese: 准备圣诞前夜宴会使我伤透脑筋。

sentences.english: Mother will she break my heart?
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，她会让我伤透心吗？

sentences.english: I beat my brains (out) to get a job.
sentences.chinese: 为了找寻工作，我伤透了脑筋。

sentences.english: You know if you break my heart. I'll go.
sentences.chinese: 你知，假如，妳伤透了我的心我会走。

sentences.english: All love is lucky,even when it breaks your heart.
sentences.chinese: 所有的爱都是幸运的，即使它伤透了你的心。

sentences.english: 'It's breaking their hearts, ' went on the baker.
sentences.chinese: “这伤透了他们的心，”面包师继续说道。

sentences.english: She broke his heart , he spent his whole life tryin' to forget.
sentences.chinese: 她伤透了他的心，他将要用他的余生去忘记。

sentences.english: My failure, and rejection, broke her.
sentences.chinese: 我的失败和拒绝伤透了她的心。

sentences.english: "Elwyn, " she cried again, "don't break my heart.
sentences.chinese: 她再次哭喊道，“别伤透了我的心。

definition: to give up/to admit failure/to drop the matter/to reconcile oneself to loss/to have no more illusions about
to have a heart of stone/hard-hearted/unfeeling
to be softhearted/to be tenderhearted/to be kindhearted

nothing sadder than a withered heart (idiom attributed to Confucius by Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])/no greater sorrow than a heart that never rejoices/the worst sorrow is not as bad as an uncaring heart/nothing is more wretched than apathy
pinyin: ai1 mo4 da4 yu2 xin1 si3

definition: (lit.) so exhausted (by difficulties in a relationship) that one feels one could never fall in love again (Internet slang)/disenchanted with sth
to have had enough of/to be fed up with/to have had one's fill of
felt a chill (in one's heart)/(one's heart) sank
